OOC:From this post, Daemos and Belthassan will be considered inactive 
for as long as it takes to find someone wishing to play one of 
Tankor's char.

Reformatting had been going on for a few cycles now at the Tripredacus 
base. The four new members were now techno-organic, and the two 
commanders had gone in what seemed to be a semi-stasis lock.

Gesper:
Melchana, help me get them linked to the energon fruits. This will 
stabilize them.

Melchana:
Right... I guess we have no time to waste...

Worries were not a usual experience for her, but, at the moment, she 
seemed to feel lots of them.

Thrust:
Let us help! After all, they're our commanders too!

Jetstorm:
Yeah! We are Tripredacus, and I'll be a slagged piece of scrap if I 
leave my superior dying!

He tried to transform, but nothing happened. At the same time, Daemos 
and Belthassan finally got linked to the life support system.

Jetstorm:
SLAG IT!!! WHY CAN'T I TRANSFORM?

Melchana got tired of his shouts, and she decided to tell him. She 
walked up to him, a low roar escaping from her throat. She grasped the 
hawk's head.

Melchana:
The reason you can't transform, bird, is that you do not know how. 
From their origins, Transformers had to learn to transform. That is 
what I'll be in charge of teaching you. Got it? 
You must have seen the power that lies in the Matrix. You must focus 
on it and rid your spark of idle thoughts. For now, though, come with 
me and Gesper. we will transport Daemos and my brother to the renewal 
chamber. They will be able to recuperate faster there.

Strika:
Is this renewal chamber a CR chamber?

Gesper came behind his sister:
In some ways yes, but it is more than that. It allows us, 
techno-organic beings, to regain the strenght we have lost either in 
battle or during rituals, like the reformatting. But it also allows us 
to rid ourselves of viruses that may affect us, wether they are 
dormant or active. But enough with explanations. Let's get to work.

Melchana transformed to lioness mode. She and Tankor carried the 
commanders on their back while Strika and Thrust hovered near them, 
holding the enrgon fruits in the air. Gesper and Jetstorm led the way, 
opening the doors and installing them in the Renewal chamber.
